name: This Magical Girl is a B*tch
summary:
Join Tabitha Bones in act 1 of a lighthearted romp through the world's most dysfunctional school!

It's Halloween Spirit Week, and even grumpy Tabbie is ready for some fun. But when her nemesis, Eden (the worst kind of 8th grade boy), steals her thunder, everything goes horribly wrong.

Luckily for her, a magical pixie gives her the power to grab fate and whack the sh*t out of anyone in her way!
